SEARCH
Package com.reductio.funcoes

Class Function

java.lang.Object
com.reductio.funcoes.Function
Direct Known Subclasses:
Exponencial, Logaritmica, Polinomial, Trigonometrica
public abstract class Function extends Object
Abstract base class for mathematical functions. Provides automatic identification and instantiation of specific function types.
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Reductio Team

  • Method Details

    • identify

      public static Function identify(Expr expr, String variable)
      Identifies the type of function from an expression and returns the appropriate instance.
      Parameters:
      expr - the mathematical expression to analyze
      variable - the primary variable name
      Returns:
      a specific Function subclass instance or null if not identified
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid

    • getType

      public abstract String getType()
      Returns the type description of this function.
      Returns:
      function type description

    • evaluate

      public abstract double evaluate(double value)
      Evaluates the function at the given value.
      Parameters:
      value - the input value
      Returns:
      the function output
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if value is outside domain

    • evaluate

      public double evaluate(Map<String,Double> variables)
      Evaluates the function with multiple variables.
      Parameters:
      variables - map of variable names to values
      Returns:
      the function output
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if required variables are missing

      public boolean isDefinedAt(double value)
      Checks if this function is defined at the given value.
      Parameters:
      value - the input value
      Returns:
      true if function is defined at this value
